scripts.frontend:dev: pnpm db:start && sleep 1 && pnpm -F frontend run dev
scripts.compile-circuit: cd ./packages/circuit && wasm-pack build --release --target bundler && rm ./pkg/.gitignore && pnpm -F frontend i --no-cache && rm -rf packages/frontend/.next
scripts.compile-node: cd ./packages/circuit && wasm-pack build --release --target nodejs --out-dir pkgnode && rm ./pkgnode/.gitignore && pnpm -F frontend i --no-cache && rm -rf packages/frontend/.next
